doc: ios_user take more than one ssh key
<!--- Verify first that your feature was not already discussed on GitHub -->
<!--- Complete *all* sections as described, this form is processed automatically -->
<!--- Describe the new feature/improvement briefly below -->
Allow submission of more than one ssh key per user.
<!--- Write the short name of the module, plugin, task or feature below, use your best guess if unsure -->
<!--- Describe how the feature would be used, why it is needed and what it would solve -->

Each workstation for a user should have a separate ssh key in order to allow revocation in the event of the machine's loss or compromise. Unfortunately standard IOS only allows a maximum of 2 keys, nonetheless, the ios_user module only allows a single key.
